data.message: Agreed with the concepts, but I think you are going a bit too extreme. Yes, this is an issue, yes code is not everything. BUT , beautiful code, proper abstraction, perfecting the craft of coding, clean code, test driven development, maintainability, flexibility, Xability is important so when you know the proper product you need to build, you can actually build it and NOT destroy it with bad engineering as I have seen hundreds of times. Agile, flexible growth with proper engineering and business VISION, is the key. Once we have that we just might get to see an Egyptian company create an Egyptian product used by people all over the world. Then the business has to have a trustworthy engineering, that know when to build, buy, reuse, integrate. Until that happens, we will just carry on...

فكرة الكود اهم وهو منتهى الوجود في اللاوجود فكرة مرتبطة بالمبتدأين عموما، لأنها الشكل النمطي اللي العقل الباطن فاهمه عن البرمجيات. لكن بتعدد الخبرات والسنوات يستطيع اي مبرمج إدراك أن كتابة كود معين لتنفيذ شيء ما هو اسهل ما في الموضوع. الأهم والأصعب هو المنطق.
When is the code good enough? that is a more accurate question, and not to love the code as to be against rewriting it completely or even throwing it away...

Design-First vs Engineering-First 

للأسف.. كتييير من المطورين في مصر مازالوا مقتنعين ان القيادة والقرارات لازم تكون ليهم
بينما المشاريع والشركات الناجحة بقوا بيخلوا القيادة والقرارات للـ UX

ولما المطور يلاقي نفسه مجبر انه يبقى تحت قيادة حد تاني مش مطور اكبر منه... يحاول بقى يتذاكى عليه ويقوله ماينفعش ماينفعش ماينفعش

فأصبح على الـ UX الشاطر انه يتعلم برمجة كمان ولو اساسيات فقط ويفضل ديما متابع التحديثات ويقرا الـ guidelines بتاعة كل اصدار جديد ويعرف ايه اللي اتفتح وايه اللي اتقفل... عشان مايتضحكش عليه!

Holistic approach is what will succeed, the wholeness of the system, they wholeness of the knowledge. The code, the product, the environment the income, the cost, someone has to be watching the whole picture or there has to be combined awareness across the team of the whole picture. With synergy and trust between the business and the Engineering they will be able to succeed with enough mutual respect and trust
lw sm7t y3ne eh sociability plans ?? 3shan Google didn't help me enough

I see a bunch of statements that look like they are true from far, but I am not really sure what the hell is the problem you are pin-pointing and providing counter arguments for!

Don't get me wrong, it looks legit if you only give it one second of thought. But tell me again, what is the problem?
All of them are very important but the code is the engine ;) :D
